Subject Direct Access Application for Rehearing Importance High Attached for your review and comment is a third draft of the application for rehearing The main changes are the addition of several morep arties and will those who arranged for these parties to sign on PLEASE forward a copy of this draft to your contacts so that they get to see it and know how to contact me with any comments or suggestions and a legislative historys ection which summarizes the various pertinent bills and resolutions Please reply with any comments or suggested changes as soon as possible Thanks Dan Law Re FW Direct Access Application for Rehearing Cc NonPrivilegedpst Susan Please keep me posted on the appeal process The California Cast Metals Association encompasses over of the casting tonnage poured in California and is a heavy consumer of electricity Were definitely interested in any work being done of DA Thanks James Dasovich Jeff wrote GreetingsThe Commission denied it Work is underway to appeal the Commissions decision to the courts Sue Mara is taking the lead on this for us She can update you on where the appeal stands Be great to get you support forparticipation in the appealBestJeff Original Message From California Cast Metals Assoc mailto Sent Monday October PM To Dasovich Jeff Subject Re FW Direct Access Application for Rehearing Jeff What was the final status of the rehearing application CCMA signed thanks James Dasovich Jeff wrote Original Message From Mara Susan Sent Thursday September PM To Dasovich Jeff Subject FW Direct Access Application for Rehearing
